results.overview: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a rundown circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.
results.title: Animal Crackers

results.overview: It’s 1940, and the population of Japan is divided over its entry into World War II. Satoko, the wife of a fabric merchant, is devoted to her husband but is beginning to suspect he’s up to something. Soon she allows herself to be drawn into a game in which she enigmatically conceals her intentions.
results.title: Wife of a Spy

results.overview: A smart teenage girl comes of age in a small town with her self-centered parents who had her when they were teenagers.
results.title: As Cool as I Am

results.overview: While Chappy Sinclair is saddled with a bunch of misfits and delinquents for his flight school, he turns to his protégé Doug Masters to assist him in rounding them into shape for an important competition. During their training, they stumble upon a group of subversive air force officers who are dealing in toxic waste as a sideline.
results.title: Iron Eagle on the Attack

results.overview: After the death of her father, a woman is forced to take over as empress and fight to save her kingdom.
results.title: An Empress and the Warriors

results.original_title: Belle et Sébastien 3 : Le Dernier Chapitre
results.overview: 12 year-old Sebastian has decided not to follow his father and Angelina to Canada, deciding to stay in the alps to watch over Belle who has now become the mother of three beautiful pups. When a stranger arrives claiming to be Belle’s rightful owner, Sebastian will do all it takes to protect his best friend and her little ones.
results.title: Belle and Sebastian 3: The Last Chapter

results.original_title: I Am Not a Serial Killer
results.overview: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.
results.title: I Am Not a Serial Killer

results.overview: Two teenage girls in small-town Sweden. Elin is beautiful, popular, and bored with life. Agnes is friendless, sad, and secretly in love with Elin.
results.title: Show Me Love

results.overview: After a breakup, Carrie spends her first weekend alone in her house.
results.title: Carrie Lives Alone

results.overview: A young confidential informant is sent on a dangerous undercover operation. It's a no-holds-barred look at the vulnerable foot soldiers of the War on Drugs, young criminals who are pressured to work for the police.
results.title: All Souls

results.overview: Two literary women compete for 20 years: one writes for the critics; the other one, to get rich.
results.title: Rich and Famous

results.original_title: The Story of Frozen: Making a Disney Animated Classic
results.overview: A behind-the-scene look at the origins and evolution of the Academy Award-winning film.
results.title: The Story of Frozen: Making a Disney Animated Classic

results.original_title: Exterminadores do Além Contra a Loira do Banheiro
results.overview: A group of three youtubers who call themselves experts in supernatural beings decide to win public recognition once and for all. For this they plot a plan to capture a being known to all. It is the spirit of a light-haired woman who died in an unknown way and who haunts the bathrooms of schools across the country: the blonde in the bathroom.
results.title: Ghost Killers vs. Bloody Mary

results.original_title: Dead Over Heels: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery
results.overview: Librarian and real crime buff Aurora “Roe” Teagarden never liked Detective Sergeant Jack Burns, but she also never wanted to see him dead. When his body is found outside of Aurora’s home, she then becomes  the main suspect. Determined to find the killer and clear her name, Aurora can't help but to get  involved once again.
results.title: Dead Over Heels: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery

results.original_title: Le Grand Blond avec une chaussure noire
results.overview: Hapless orchestra player becomes an unwitting pawn of rival factions within the French secret service after he is chosen as a decoy by being identified as a super secret agent.
results.title: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe

results.overview: Two families, abolitionist Northerners the Stonemans and Southern landowners the Camerons, intertwine. When Confederate colonel Ben Cameron is captured in battle, nurse Elsie Stoneman petitions for his pardon. In Reconstruction-era South Carolina, Cameron founds the Ku Klux Klan, battling Elsie's congressman father and his African-American protégé, Silas Lynch.
results.title: The Birth of a Nation

results.overview: An expert hacker is targeted by a sentient AI after she realizes the threat it poses, and she must try to stay off its radar long enough to stop it.
results.title: Robotapocalypse

results.overview: Family and friends try to sabotage the budding romance between a young upper class girl and a humble student.
results.title: Love Hurts

results.original_title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
results.overview: Charles, an attorney, and Helen, his devoted wife, seemed to have everything – money, a beautiful mansion – the American Dream. However, as Helen prepares to celebrate their 18th wedding anniversary, her life takes an unexpected twist when she comes home to find her clothes packed up in a U-Haul van parked in the driveway. Charles is divorcing her and kicks her out. Helen moves in with her grandmother Madea, an old woman who doesn't take any lip from anyone. Madea helps Helen through these tough times by showing her what is really important in life. Helen is forced to rediscover love, life and religion on her pursuit for happiness.
results.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman

results.overview: Galindo works in a bank. One day he convinces the other employees in the bank to plan a hold-up in the bank they are working. They prepare everything carefully. However, real robbers come just before the fake ones.
results.title: Robbery at 3 O'clock
